text: Sun Wensheng (born 1942) is a People's Republic of China politician. He was born in Weihai, Shandong. He was vice governor and governor of Shanxi from 1994 to 1998.http://www.chinavitae.com/biography/Sun_Wensheng/career ==References== Category:1942 births Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Shandong Category:Communist Party of China politicians from Shandong Category:Vice-governors of Shanxi Category:Governors of Shanxi Category:Living people
title: Sun Wensheng
